p: Clinical specimens and associated demographic and clinical outcome data were available for analysis from 180 patients with laboratory-confirmed H5N1 infection, representing 90% of all Indonesian patients reported to WHO since the emergence of H5N1 influenza in Indonesia in 2005 until 2017 ( Figure 1A, Table 1). Patients originated from 15 of 34 Indonesian provinces, with the majority of cases from the province of Java ( Figure 1B). The median age of patients was 19 years (range, 1â€“67), and 54% were female ( Table 1).
